verses.text_plain: The word of the Lord came again unto me, saying,
verses.verse_html: 1The word of the Lord came again unto me, saying,

verses.text_plain: Son of man, set thy face against the Ammonites, and prophesy against them;
verses.verse_html: 2Son of man, set thy face against the Ammonites, and prophesy against them;

verses.text_plain: And say unto the Ammonites, Hear the word of the Lord God; Thus saith the Lord God; Because thou saidst, Aha, against my sanctuary, when it was profaned; and against the land of Israel, when it was desolate; and against the house of Judah, when they went into captivity;
verses.verse_html: 3And say unto the Ammonites, Hear the word of the Lord God; Thus saith the Lord God; Because thou saidst, Aha, against my sanctuary, when it was profaned; and against the land of Israel, when it was desolate; and against the house of Judah, when they went into captivity;

verses.text_plain: Behold, therefore I will deliver thee to the men of the east for a possession, and they shall set their palaces in thee, and make their dwellings in thee: they shall eat thy fruit, and they shall drink thy milk.
verses.verse_html:
4Behold, therefore I will deliver thee to the men of the east for a possession, and they shall set their palaces in thee, and make their dwellings in thee: they shall eat thy fruit, and they shall drink thy milk. ▼
▼ men: Heb. children

verses.text_plain: And I will make Rabbah a stable for camels, and the Ammonites a couchingplace for flocks: and ye shall know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 5And I will make Rabbah a stable for camels, and the Ammonites a couchingplace for flocks: and ye shall know that I am the Lord.

verses.text_plain: For thus saith the Lord God; Because thou hast clapped thine hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced in heart with all thy despite against the land of Israel;
verses.verse_html:
6For thus saith the Lord God; Because thou hast clapped thine hands, and stamped with the feet, and rejoiced in heart with all thy despite against the land of Israel; ▼
▼ hands: Heb. hand
 , ▼
▼ feet: Heb. foot
 , ▼
▼ heart: Heb. soul

verses.text_plain: Behold, therefore I will stretch out mine hand upon thee, and will deliver thee for a spoil to the heathen; and I will cut thee off from the people, and I will cause thee to perish out of the countries: I will destroy thee; and thou shalt know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
7Behold, therefore I will stretch out mine hand upon thee, and will deliver thee for a spoil to the heathen; and I will cut thee off from the people, and I will cause thee to perish out of the countries: I will destroy thee; and thou shalt know that I am the Lord. ▼
▼ a spoil: or, meat

tokens.text: Behold, therefore I will stretch out
and I will cut thee off
and I will cause thee to perish

footnotes.body_html: ▼ a spoil: or, meat

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God; Because that Moab and Seir do say, Behold, the house of Judah is like unto all the heathen;
verses.verse_html: 8Thus saith the Lord God; Because that Moab and Seir do say, Behold, the house of Judah is like unto all the heathen;

verses.text_plain: Therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities, from his cities which are on his frontiers, the glory of the country, Beth–jeshimoth, Baal–meon, and Kiriathaim,
verses.verse_html:
9Therefore, behold, I will open the side of Moab from the cities, from his cities which are on his frontiers, the glory of the country, Beth–jeshimoth, Baal–meon, and Kiriathaim, ▼
▼ side…: Heb. shoulder of Moab

footnotes.body_html: ▼ side…: Heb. shoulder of Moab

verses.text_plain: Unto the men of the east with the Ammonites, and will give them in possession, that the Ammonites may not be remembered among the nations.
verses.verse_html:
10Unto the men of the east with the Ammonites, and will give them in possession, that the Ammonites may not be remembered among the nations. ▼
▼ with…: or, against the children of Ammon

footnotes.body_text: ▼ with…: or, against the children of Ammon
footnotes.body_html: ▼ with…: or, against the children of Ammon

verses.text_plain: And I will execute judgments upon Moab; and they shall know that I am the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 11And I will execute judgments upon Moab; and they shall know that I am the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God; Because that Edom hath dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance, and hath greatly offended, and revenged himself upon them;
verses.verse_html:
12Thus saith the Lord God; Because that Edom hath dealt against the house of Judah by taking vengeance, and hath greatly offended, and revenged himself upon them; ▼
▼ by…: Heb. by revenging revengement

footnotes.body_html: ▼ by…: Heb. by revenging revengement

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; I will also stretch out mine hand upon Edom, and will cut off man and beast from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman; and they of Dedan shall fall by the sword.
verses.verse_html:
13Therefore thus saith the Lord God; I will also stretch out mine hand upon Edom, and will cut off man and beast from it; and I will make it desolate from Teman; and they of Dedan shall fall by the sword. ▼
▼ they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan

tokens.text: from it; and I will make

footnotes.body_text: ▼ they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan
footnotes.body_html: ▼ they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan

verses.text_plain: And I will lay my vengeance upon Edom by the hand of my people Israel: and they shall do in Edom according to mine anger and according to my fury; and they shall know my vengeance, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 14And I will lay my vengeance upon Edom by the hand of my people Israel: and they shall do in Edom according to mine anger and according to my fury; and they shall know my vengeance, saith the Lord God.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord God; Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge, and have taken vengeance with a despiteful heart, to destroy it for the old hatred;
verses.verse_html:
15Thus saith the Lord God; Because the Philistines have dealt by revenge, and have taken vengeance with a despiteful heart, to destroy it for the old hatred; ▼
▼ for the…: or, with perpetual hatred

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for the…: or, with perpetual hatred
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for the…: or, with perpetual hatred

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I will stretch out mine hand upon the Philistines, and I will cut off the Cherethims, and destroy the remnant of the sea coast.
verses.verse_html:
16Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I will stretch out mine hand upon the Philistines, and I will cut off the Cherethims, and destroy the remnant of the sea coast. ▼
▼ sea coast: or, haven of the sea

footnotes.body_text: ▼ sea coast: or, haven of the sea
footnotes.body_html: ▼ sea coast: or, haven of the sea

verses.text_plain: And I will execute great vengeance upon them with furious rebukes; and they shall know that I am the Lord, when I shall lay my vengeance upon them.
verses.verse_html:
17And I will execute great vengeance upon them with furious rebukes; and they shall know that I am the Lord, when I shall lay my vengeance upon them. ▼
▼ great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances

footnotes.body_html: ▼ great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances
